title: Balance of Nature Fruits & Veggies
description: Order our Fruits, Veggies or Fiber & Spice to beat your blah. Sign up for Preferred Membership and get discount pricing and free shipping!
cleaned_text: Balance of Nature Fruits & Veggies A Proprietary Blend of 16 Whole Fruits & 15 Whole Vegetables - Free priority shipping - Preferred pricing on all orders - Convenient shipments every 28 days - Reschedule, hold, or cancel at any time - Complimentary personal Health Coach - 30-day money-back guarantee - One-time Member fee of only $24.95 - No preferred member price discount - No complimentary Health Coaching - No 30-day money-back guarantee Fruits & Veggies Subscribe & Save 33% - Whole Food Nutrition: Balance of Nature Fruits & Veggies are made from fresh, whole produce. Through our advanced cold vacuum process, the vitamins, minerals and phytonutrients of the fruits and vegetables are preserved so that you can get that vital nutrition in each capsule. - Pure, Potent, Plant Power: Balance of Nature is a whole food supplement with no fillers, extracts, synthetics, or sugars added. The only thing in our capsules is pure fruits and vegetables. - Recommendation: Fruits & Veggies is recommended to be paired with Fiber & Spice. Select the Whole Health System for the best price. Fruits — A Blend of 16 Whole Fruits Directions: Take 3 capsules daily (90 capsules per bottle) - Balance of Nature Fruits taste great because it is whole food! Some people chew the Fruits as a treat. You can also swallow them with water. Our Fruits blend was carefully crafted for combined effectiveness with each other and the Balance of Nature Veggies. Take a look at the ingredient list. This is powerful stuff! Proprietary Whole Fruit Maintain Blend: Aloe Vera, Apple, Banana, Blueberry, Cherry, Cranberry, Grape, Grapefruit, Lemon, Mango, Orange, Papaya, Pineapple, Raspberry, Strawberry, and Tomato. Veggies — A Blend of 15 Whole Vegetables Directions: Take 3 capsules daily (90 capsules per bottle) - Balance of Nature Veggies are delicious opened and sprinkled over a salad, stirred into vegetable juice, or added to a dish of cottage cheese. Of course, you can also swallow them with a glass of water. Our Veggies blend was carefully crafted for effectiveness with each other and the Balance of Nature Fruits. Check out the pure ingredients. This is serious nutrition! Proprietary Whole Veggie Maintain Blend: Broccoli, Cabbage, Carrot, Cauliflower, Cayenne Pepper, Celery Stalk, Garlic, Kale, Onion, Shiitake Mushroom, Soybean, Spinach, Sweet Potato, Wheatgrass, and Zucchini.
